name: GIBRALTAR BARBED WIRE DRUMS
effect_print: Deploying the Wire Drum, draw a line 3 barrier 1 space high in free spaces with at least one space adjacent to you. The barbed wire makes it dangerous terrain. Each space can be removed individually by any frame as a quick action by rolling a d6. Rolling a one, you fail at removing it and take 1ap kinetic damage. Otherwise, you clear one space from the barbed wire.
effect: Deploy barbed wire in a line 3 of free spaces with at least one space adjacent to you.

deployables.name: Barbed wire
deployables.detail: The barbed wire counts as dangerous terrain. It is one space high. It can be removed individually by any frame as a quick action by rolling a 1+ on a d6. Falling that check deals 1ap kinetic damage. Otherwise, you clear one space from the barbed wire.

name: ANTI FRAME BARRICADE
effect_print: You deploy a size 1 barricade box in a free adjacent space to you. (10hp 5eva) The barricade generates a line 5 barrier 5 spaces high centred on the box on the ground level. The barrier is magnetic blocking all frames and other large non-biological objects (not squads) from passing, it doesn’t grant cover and won’t stop attacks however. It only prevents frames from passing through it.
effect: Deploy a size 1 barricade box in a free adjacent space to you.

deployables.name: Barricade Box
deployables.detail: The barricade generates a line 5 barrier 5 spaces high centred on the box on the ground level. The barrier is magnetic blocking all frames and other large non-biological objects (not squads) from passing, it doesn’t grant cover and won’t stop attacks however. It only prevents frames from passing through it.

name: PIGEON MINE LAUNCHER
effect_print: Grenade; you throw a pigeon shrapnel grenade. These grenades burst mid-air perforating your target area with a rain of tiny explosives dealing 2 explosive damage to all targets in a blast 2 area. Mine; you launch air-deployed pigeon mines in a blast 2 area. All characters and objects within the area take 2 explosive damage when the mines are triggered.

actions.name: Grenade
actions.detail: You throw a pigeon shrapnel grenade. These grenades burst mid-air perforating your target area with a rain of tiny explosives dealing 2 explosive damage to all targets in a blast 2 area.

deployables.name: Mine
deployables.detail: you launch air-deployed pigeon mines in a blast 2 area. All characters and objects within the area take 2 explosive damage when a hostile character moves adjacent to the mine.

name: MILORG REMOVAL DEVICE
effect_print: You can remove any deployable with this system blowing it up in an instant, destroying them in the process. You can even remove indestructible deployables in this manner, but they can be redeployed afterwards and don’t count as being destroyed.

actions.name: Remove Device
actions.detail: You can remove any deployable with this system blowing it up in an instant, destroying them in the process. You can even remove indestructible deployables in this manner, but they can be redeployed afterwards and don’t count as being destroyed

name: DOMOVOY NHP
description: Domovoy was developed as a tool for strategic advice being able to scan entire battlefields at moment’s notice and determine optimal positioning for static deployments. In combination with newest electronic warfare equipment the NHP is capable of emulating HOR_OS code at higher capacity
effect_print: Domovoy is capable of deploying up to 6 virtual copies of your equipped deployable systems. These copies are indistinguishable from tangible objects and act as if they were real. They last for the rest of the scene, or until destroyed by an adjacent character with a successful Systems skill check as a quick action. Activating Domovoy again also removes all previous instances of its use. Deploys within line of sight and sensors ignoring requirements for adjacency.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: Deploy up to 6 virtual copies of your equipped deployable systems. These copies are indistinguishable from tangible objects and act as if they were real. They last for the rest of the scene, or until destroyed by an adjacent character with a successful Systems skill check as a quick action. Activating Domovoy again also removes all previous instances of its use. Deploys within line of sight and sensors ignoring requirements for adjacency.

name: SMART TARGETING RELAY
effect_print: You link your sensors temporarily with the one’s of an ally within sensors and line of sight. After linking up, you can use their sensors and line of sight as if they were yours for your next action.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: You link your sensors temporarily with the one’s of an ally within sensors and line of sight. After linking up, you can use their sensors and line of sight as if they were yours for your next action

name: ORBITAL GUIDANCE SCANNER
effect_print: : You receive a high-resolution orbital photograph of a blast 1 area within range 50. Until the start of your next turn, you and your allies can treat the area as if you had line of sight to it.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: You receive a high-resolution orbital photograph of a blast 1 area within range 50. Until the start of your next turn, you and your allies can treat the area as if you had line of sight to it.

name: THOR NHP
effect_print: Once activated your Thor system deploys a swarm of small flying Trondheim drones. Until the start of your next turn, all enemies within range 8 get struck by lighting from the drones taking 3 ap energy damage whenever they take a reaction and must succeed on a systems save or become stunned.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: Once activated your Thor system deploys a swarm of small flying Trondheim drones. Until the start of your next turn, all enemies within range 8 get struck by lighting from the drones taking 3 ap energy damage whenever they take a reaction.

name: ABLATIVE BURNER PLATES
effect_print: You clear 1d6 heat but take half as much burn.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: You clear 1d6 heat, but take half as much burn

name: WHITEWASH STIRRUP PUMP
effect_print: You fill a burst 3 area with Whitewash foam clearing all and every kind of burn in the area but also slowing everyone in it or moving through it and preventing you from drawing line of sight beyond adjacent spaces.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: You fill a burst 3 area with Whitewash foam clearing all and every kind of burn in the area but also slowing everyone in it or moving through it and preventing you from drawing line of sight beyond adjacent spaces.

name: RADIATOR SHIELD
effect_print: You shield an allied character within sensors and line of sight from heat lasting until used. They keep this shield even when they leave your sensors or line of sight. The shield takes on the next 1d3 heat they take from external sources.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: You shield an allied character within sensors and line of sight from heat lasting until used. They keep this shield even when they leave your sensors or line of sight. The shield absorbs the next 1d3 heat they take from external sources.

name: RESCUE CODE
effect_print: You clear all statuses and effects effecting adjacent allied characters.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: You clear all statuses and effects effecting adjacent allied characters.

name: Virutal Backdoor
effect_print: Gain the following options for INVADE

actions.name: Amplifier
actions.detail: Your target takes twice as much heat on the next tech attack they are hit by.

actions.name: Access
actions.detail: Until the start of their next turn, your targets E-defence drops by two.

name: FIRE DUPLICATION BUG
effect_print: Choose an allied character in sensors and line of sight. They are protected by a white hat trojan until the end of their next turn. When an enemy inflicts heat on them while this protection is active, the enemy must succeed on an engineering save or take as much burn from their action as it inflicted heat. Only one ally can benefit from this effect at any given time. If you target another allied character before it would have ended, it resolves automatically on your previous target.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: Choose an allied character in sensors and line of sight. They are protected by a white hat trojan until the end of their next turn. When an enemy inflicts heat on them while this protection is active, the enemy must succeed on an engineering save or take as much burn from their action as it inflicted heat. Only one ally can benefit from this effect at any given time. If you target another allied character before it would have ended, it resolves automatically on your previous target.

name: Digital Rights Management
effect_print: Gain the following options for INVADE

actions.name: Brain drain
actions.detail: Until the end of their next turn, they must roll a d6 each time they perform a tech attack. On 5+ their attack automatically misses. This effect doesn’t stack.

actions.name: Access
actions.detail: Until the start of their next turn, your targets E-defence drops by two.

name: AGGRESSIVE FLUSH SYSTEM LINKAGE
effect_print: Choose one allied and one enemy character within sensors and line of sight. You link up their onimnet receivers. Until the end of your next turn, whenever one of them gets affected by a tech attack, you take one heat and the unaffected character must succeed on a systems save or suffer the same effect as the attacks target.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: Choose one allied and one enemy character within sensors and line of sight. You link up their onimnet receivers. Until the end of your next turn, whenever one of them gets affected by a tech attack, you take one heat and the unaffected character must succeed on a systems save or suffer the same effect as the attacks target.

name: TASK MANAGER SYSTEMS HALT
effect_print: Whenever an allied character within sensors and line of sight gets hit by a tech attack you may spend a charge of this system and take the Systems Freeze Backup Shield Reaction. The allied character gains immunity to all effects from the tech attack that just hit them. Additionally, they gain 1d3 + GRIT Overshield. However, in the process, their CUP get’s overburdened and they become Slowed and Impaired until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Systems Freeze Backup Shield
actions.trigger: An allied character within sensors and line of sight gets hit by a tech attack
actions.detail: The allied character gains immunity to all effects from the tech attack that just hit them. Additionally, they gain 1d3 + GRIT Overshield. However, in the process, their CPU get’s overburdened and they become Slowed and Impaired until the end of their next turn

name: Meteorological Simulation
effect_print: Gain the following options for INVADE

actions.name: Earthquake
actions.detail: At the start of each subsequent turn your target must roll a system save until they pass one and thus end this effect. Until then they perceive a simulated earthquake needing to succeed on a hull save or be knocked prone unless they are flying.

actions.name: Blizzard
actions.detail: : At the start of each subsequent turn your target must roll a system save until they pass one and thus end this effect. Until then they perceive a simulated blizzard needing to move or boost each turn or become immobilised until they break free with a successful Hull save as a quick action.

name: FIREWALL MANIFESTATION
effect_print: This system creates a line 3 manifestation 2 spaces high. It blocks line of sight for the purpose of tech attacks. Characters can still see through it and make melee and ranged attacks through it unaltered. The System lasts until pick up again or until the end of the scene.

deployables.name: Stasis Barrier
deployables.detail: Create a line 3 manifestation 2 spaces high. It blocks line of sight for the purpose of tech attacks. Characters can still see through it and make melee and ranged attacks through it unaltered. The manufestation lasts until pick up again or until the end of the scene.

name: OOBD-Signal
effect_print: Make a tech attack against an emy within sensors and line of sight. On hit, the Out Off Battery Detonation-Signal targets their weaponry causing catastrophic misfires. All their weapons become unloaded, they become jammed and take 2ap explosive damage for every installed ranged weapon or system with the grenade or mine tag. If they carry no such weapons or systems, this attack automatically fails against them. A Character can only be target once by this effect per scene.

actions.name: TODO
actions.detail: Make a tech attack against an emy within sensors and line of sight. On hit, the Out Of Battery Detonation-Signal  targets  their  weaponry  causing  catastrophic  misfires.  All  their  weapons become unloaded, they become jammed and take 2ap explosive damage for every installed ranged weapon or system with the grenade or mine tag. If they carry no such weapons or systems, this attack automatically fails against them. A Character can only be target once by this effect per scene.

name: ESCAPE TOOL
effect_print: You make a tactical retreat. First, deploy a burst 2 smoke cover, then teleport up two two spaces. You become invisible afterwards until you move, voluntarily or involuntarily or until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: Flee the cops
actions.detail: You make a tactical retreat. First, deploy a burst 2 smoke cover, then teleport up two two spaces. You become invisible afterwards until you move, voluntarily or involuntarily or until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: DARTS Heads-Up Marker
actions.detail: The enemy suffers a system failure in its counter electronics glowing up on your Combat UIs. The next attack against it, if it hits, counts as a critical hit.

actions.name: Predesignated Target Command
actions.detail: After successful hacking your enemy target, you designate an ally within sensors and line of sight. Your enemy target takes 3ap energy damage whenever they attack an a target other than the one designated by you until the end of their next turn..

name: Ambush Pack
effect_print: Adjacent allied characters gain +1 accuracy on their first attack each turn when they stand within soft cover and deal +2 bonus damage.
effect: Adjacent allied characters gain +1 accuracy on their first attack each turn when they stand within soft cover and deal +2 bonus damage.

name: Ranger cloud
effect_print: once active as a protocol, this system spreads smoke creating soft cover in every space you cross while moving this turn. The smoke last until the end your next turn.

actions.name: Deploy smoke
actions.detail: Spreads smoke creating soft cover in every space you cross while moving this turn. The smoke last until the end your next turn.

name: Pillbox drone
effect_print: The drone, once deployed creates a blast 4 area. When an enemy first enters or leaves the area on its turn the drone attacks them with a reaction dealing 3ap explosive.

deployables.name: Barbed wire
deployables.detail: The drone, once deployed creates a blast 4 area. When an enemy first enters or leaves the area on its turn the drone attacks them with a reaction dealing 3ap explosive.

name: Dampener shield
effect_print: Upon activation, this system immobilises you, creating a blast 3 shield around you. Within this shield you supress all area of effect attacks forcing anyone using them to attack a single target only. The shield lasts until retracted as a protocol.

actions.name: Deploy shield
actions.detail: Upon activation, this system immobilises you, creating a blast 3 shield around you. Within this shield you supress all area of effect attacks forcing anyone using them to attack a single target only. The shield lasts until retracted as a protocol.

actions.name: Retract shield
actions.detail: The shield looses it's effect.

name: Droptrooper Support
effect_print:
Call in an allied subaltern Droptrooper NPC in a free space in line of sight. They take a turn of their own but follow your commands and do as you say.
Size ½ 10 HP 13 Eva 8 Edef 4 speed 2 Armour 4 Heat cap
Paratrooper LMG Quick action attack 1d3+2 kinetic 2reliable 5 range
Framefist Quick action attack ap 1d6 +2 explosive range 5 limited 3

actions.detail: 2 reliable 5 range
